definition: to reside/to live/to dwell/to be in/to be situated at/to stay/to get along with/to be in a position of/to deal with/to discipline/to punish
place/location/spot/point/office/department/bureau/respect/classifier for locations or items of damage: spot, point

sentences.english: So as I face tomorrow with its problems large and small.
sentences.chinese: 故我面临的遭遇，不论大小的难处。

sentences.english: Their difficult relationship has lasted for a decade and a half.
sentences.chinese: 不过，他们关系难处，仅只维持了十年半。

sentences.english: Zhuang Guiyang discusses the difficulty of analysing climate-change policy-making in China.
sentences.chinese: 庄贵阳在文章内讨论了中国在气候决策方面的难处。

sentences.english: God hath seen mine affliction and the labour of my hands, and rebuked thee yesternight .
sentences.chinese: 但上帝看见我的难处和劳苦，于是就在昨夜责备你。

sentences.english: FEW weeks ago my colleague wrote about the difficulties of translating Pushkin.
sentences.chinese: 几星期前，我同事写了写关于翻译普希金的难处。

sentences.english: We sometimes experience difficulties and seem at the end of our tethers , as if all is hopeless.
sentences.chinese: 有时候我们经历难处，看来毫无出路，好像要绝望了。

sentences.english: A FEW weeks ago my colleague wrote about the difficulties of translating Pushkin.
sentences.chinese: 几星期前，我同事写了写关于翻译普希金的难处。

sentences.english: You have to respond the way Jesus would.
sentences.chinese: 因此，你必须像耶稣一般的回应难处。

sentences.english: I'm really sorry, but you see my difficulty.
sentences.chinese: 真对不起，但也希望您能谅解我的难处。

sentences.english: The only serious difficulty was the want of coin for the ordinary purposes of trade.
sentences.chinese: 唯一的难处，是急需硬币来满足日常贸易需求。

sentences.english: Since the difficulty of effort to do, learning from the bitter derived.
sentences.chinese: 功夫自难处做去，学问从苦中得来。

definition: to empathize/to allow (for sth)/to show understanding/to appreciate
a hidden trouble hard to mention (idiom)/sth too embarrassing to mention/an embarrassing illness
to feel embarrassed or awkward/to make things difficult (for someone)/to find things difficult (to do or manage)
Every family goes through its problems. (idiom)
pinyin: jia1 jia1 you3 ben3 nan2 nian4 de5 jing1

definition: to put oneself in sb else's shoes (idiom)
to bother/to press sb, usu. to do sth/it's a tough job/sorry to bother you (polite, used to thank sb for a favor)
a secret/sth best not told to anyone/confidential information
to force someone to do something
